title: Intel i7 4770k - 3.5 GHz
body: I've upgraded the processor in my computer and I no longer need the old one. It's in great condition; it runs just as well as it did the first day out of the box. Theres a bit of wear on the front plate from wiping off thermal paste several times, but it's just superficial damage. It doesn't affect the performance at all. The CPU has 4 cores and 8 threads, clocks at base 3.5 GHz, boosts up to 3.9 GHz. I've been able to overclock it up to 4.5 GHz, but if you do that, you're probably going to need water cooling.
author: linux4lyfe

title: ASUS Z87 Deluxe LGA 1150 DDR3
body: I've upgraded the motherboard in my computer and I no longer need the old one. This board is in great condition, and served me well over the years. It's LGA 1150 and accepts DDR3 RAM, so make sure you have the right parts or you're going to regret it.
author: linux4lyfe

title: HP Envy 360 degree screen
body: Selling my old laptop. There isn't anything wrong with it, I just don't need it any more. Spilled coffee on it once, but I took it apart and cleaned it and it's worked fine ever since. There is, however, a bit of scarring on the front plate as a result of having to use a screwdriver to pry it open.
author: sadboys420

title: G.SKILL Ripjaws X DDR3 RAM - 32 GB
body: I've upgraded the RAM in my computer and I no longer need the old sticks. Great condition, 4 sticks of 8 GB 240 pin. The memory speed is 1866, so make sure your processor is capable of taking that memory or you'll regret it (since your computer won't run if it doesn't match).
author: linux4lyfe

title: Settlers of Catan Box Set
body: I have an extra copy of Settlers of Catan. It's only been played a few times. Still has all the pieces, and even the sticker.
author: BoredGaymer97

title: Missing rabbit
body: My pet rabbit Ragnar the Rabbit King (or just Ragnar for short), has been missing since 6/5/17. If you find him, please call me at the provided phone number or email me at the provided email. I'm offering a reward of $50.
author: bunnyboy12

title: Free back rubs
body: im giving free back rubs under the burnside bridge. come alone if youre interested ;)
